text: “Ambiri mwa amene anapatsidwa mabuku, akufuna kukubwezani (kukutembenuzani) kuti mukhale osakhulupirira pambuyo pa chikhulupiliro chanu, chifukwa chadumbo lomwe lili m’mitima mwawo (lomwe lawapeza) pambuyo powaonekera choonadi poyera. Choncho akhululukireni ndi kuwasiya kufikira Allah adzabweretse lamulo Lake*; ndithudi Allah Ngokhoza chilichonse
